T02TD2241E:120a-3: de kho na nyid rab tu bstan pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2241E:120a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2241E:120a-5: sangs rgyas sku gsum ngo bo can //
T02TD2241E:120a-6: gang gi mthu las skyes gyur pa //
T02TD2241E:120a-7: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa mchog / shes rab thabs bdag la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2241E:120a-8: skye bo rab rib can dag la //
T02TD2241E:120a-9: mkha' la skra shad snang ba ltar //
T02TD2241E:120a-10: de bzhin ma rig mun bsgribs pa'i //
T02TD2241E:120a-11: byis pa rnams ni 'gro snyam sems //
T02TD2241E:120a-12: 'khrul pas mkha' la mtshon pa yi /
T02TD2241E:120a-13: skra la dag pa'i mig gis lta //
T02TD2241E:120a-14: mthong ba dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2241E:120a-15: srid pa thams cad de ltar rtogs //
T02TD2241E:120a-16: kye lags nam mkha'i dkyil ltos dang //
T02TD2241E:120a-17: skra shad 'dzings pa bdag gis mthong //
T02TD2241E:120a-18: dag pa'i mig can des smras pa //
T02TD2241E:120a-19: yod min khyod kyi blo gros 'khrul //
T02TD2241E:120a-20: rab rib kyis 'khrul bsal ba'i phyir //
T02TD2241E:120a-21: phyi nas yod min zhes brjod kyi //
T02TD2241E:120a-22: gsal dang mi gsal stong pa'i phyir //
T02TD2241E:120a-23: de nyid du ni dgag grub med //
T02TD2241E:120a-24: de bzhin zag pa med chos rnams //
T02TD2241E:120a-25: longs spyod sprul pa'i sku dag gi //
T02TD2241E:120a-26: rten 'brel smon lam dag gis ni //
T02TD2241E:120a-27: sems can don du rab tu 'jug / de dag de las tha dad min //
T02TD2241E:120a-28: de dag de yi rang bzhin phyir //
T02TD2241E:120a-29: de dag rang bzhin ma bcos grub //
T02TD2241E:120a-30: de dbyes sems kyi dogs pa sel //
T02TD2241E:120a-31: gal te skye med mi 'dod na //
T02TD2241E:120a-32: ldog pas dngos la tha dad pas //
T02TD2241E:120a-33: rnal 'byor spyod gzhung las gzhan pa'i //
T02TD2241E:120a-34: dbu ma'i don du i ltar 'gyur //
T02TD2241E:120a-35: gal te mtha' bzhi rnam spangs pas //
T02TD2241E:120a-36: dbu ma'i don ni khyad 'phags na //
T02TD2241E:120a-37: rnam rig la yang thal bar 'gyur //
T02TD2241E:120a-38: de yang 'di dag rnam spang phyir //
T02TD2241E:120a-39: mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba'i //
T02TD2241E:120a-40: shes pa gnyis med rdzas bden pa //
T02TD2241E:120a-41: brtags pas stong zhing gnyis su med //
T02TD2241E:120a-42: rnam rig smra ba'i mkhas pas rig / yang dag mtha' las sna tshogs 'di //
T02TD2241E:120b-0: de ni ma skyes @120b rdzas kyis stong //
T02TD2241E:120b-1: ma 'dres ming tsam pa nyid do //
T02TD2241E:120b-2: bdag byin brlab dang 'od gsal ba'i //
T02TD2241E:120b-3: dbye ba kun mkhyen gyis gsungs pa //
T02TD2241E:120b-4: gang tshe de dag gcig bstan pa //
T02TD2241E:120b-5: des ni chad par lta ba spangs //
T02TD2241E:120b-6: 'bras bu de nyid mi mthun phyogs //
T02TD2241E:120b-7: gang la chags pa yod min pa //
T02TD2241E:120b-8: 'bad med sbyor ba de yis ni ;
T02TD2241E:120b-9: / sangs rgyas go 'phang des rdzogs byed //
T02TD2241E:120b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa'i //
T02TD2241E:120b-11: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis bzhed pa //
T02TD2241E:120b-12: sangs rgyas chos kyi rjes 'brangs nyid //
T02TD2241E:120b-13: chos kyi de nyid ma skyes pa'o //
T02TD2241E:120b-14: de nyid rab tu bstan byas las //
T02TD2241E:120b-15: bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pa //
T02TD2241E:120b-16: des ni 'jig rten ma lus pa //
T02TD2241E:120b-17: zung du 'jug pa'i snod gyur cig / de kho na nyid rab tu bstan pa zhes bya ba //
T02TD2241E:120b-18: slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
